title: Tzitzimitl
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Tzitzimitl 1 [![Tzitzimitl.png](/images/0/02/Tzitzimitl.png)](/File:Tzitzimitl.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                      | 69-140                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                          | 22                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                      | 2077                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                             | 10                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                  | 12                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                            | 16                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                      | Immune                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| Attack1                                                                             | 25 ([engulf](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [drain speed](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                              |
| Attack2                                                                             | 25 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [drain experience](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                           |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                             | [rC++](/Cold "Cold") [rElec](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+](/Poison "Poison") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                   | [Holy](/Holy "Holy")                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                       | Land                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                        | [Human](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence")                                                                                                                     |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                    | [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors")                                                                                                                                |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                    | [Demonic](/Category:Demonic_holiness "Category:Demonic holiness")                                                                                                                       |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                | [Large](/Category:Large_monsters "Category:Large monsters")                                                                                                                             |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                | Tzitzimitl, Tzitzimitl                                                                                                                                                                  |
| Flags                                                                               | [Evil](/Evil "Evil") [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") [Flying](/Flying "Flying")                                                                                         |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A horrific fallen divinity, possessing jaws of gnashing stone and a necklace of starry organs. It spreads disease and despair, and patiently awaits the end of days when it will devour the sun. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Tzitzimimeh** are one of the most versatile among fiends, posing a threat to characters whether they're living or [undead](/Undead "Undead"). While [negative energy resistance](/Negative_energy_resistance "Negative energy resistance") helps reduce the effects of most of their attacks, [torment](/Torment "Torment") and [Dispel Undead](/Dispel_Undead "Dispel Undead") always sting. They can be found in [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium") and the [Hells](/Hell "Hell") (primarily [Tartarus](/Tartarus "Tartarus") and summoned by [Ereshkigal](/Ereshkigal "Ereshkigal")), and some monsters may summon them with the [Summon Greater Demon](/Summon_Greater_Demon "Summon Greater Demon") spell.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                          |                                                      |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") (3d29)          | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Symbol of Torment](/Symbol_of_Torment "Symbol of Torment")              | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Dispel Undead Range](/Dispel_Undead_Range "Dispel Undead Range") (3d32) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

This is the only fiend against which being undead does is not a guaranteed upside - in fact, it is possibly more dangerous to be so, given that Dispel Undead deals as much damage as [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") but bypasses AC, EV and any resistances. If you are undead, keep them at the edge of LOS or behind other monsters and pelt them from afar with ranged attacks. Fortunately, their multiplicity of spells makes them torment slightly less often than other fiends, and having rN+++ greatly reduces the threat they pose. Use a [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") weapon or high-powered non-elemental conjurations to dispatch them, for they have no specific vulnerabilities.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Tzitzimimeh had [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold") in their spell lists.
- Prior to its removal in [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), Tzitzimimeh had [rotting](/Rot "Rot") melee attacks.
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), Tzitzimimeh casted [Dispel Undead](/Dispel_Undead "Dispel Undead") instead of [Dispel Undead Range](/Dispel_Undead_Range "Dispel Undead Range"), which was functionally equivalent.
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), Tzitzimitl melee created [miasma](/Miasma "Miasma"), instead of slowing and rotting victims.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), they were called Shadow Fiends, who lacked miasma attacks and had less HD.
html:
Tzitzimitl

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Tzitzimitl 1 
HP 69-140
HD 22
XP 2077
Speed 10
AC 12
EV 16
Will Immune
Attack1 25 (engulf: drain speed)
Attack2 25 (bite: drain experience)


Resistances rC++
rElec
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Large
Type Tzitzimitl, Tzitzimitl
Flags Evil

See invisible
Flying
A horrific fallen divinity, possessing jaws of gnashing stone and a necklace of starry organs. It spreads disease and despair, and patiently awaits the end of days when it will devour the sun.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Tzitzimimeh are one of the most versatile among fiends, posing a threat to characters whether they're living or undead. While negative energy resistance helps reduce the effects of most of their attacks, torment and Dispel Undead always sting. They can be found in Pandemonium and the Hells (primarily Tartarus and summoned by Ereshkigal), and some monsters may summon them with the Summon Greater Demon spell.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Draining (3d29) Magical flag
Slot2 Symbol of Torment Magical flag
Slot3 Dispel Undead Range (3d32) Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

This is the only fiend against which being undead does is not a guaranteed upside - in fact, it is possibly more dangerous to be so, given that Dispel Undead deals as much damage as Iron Shot but bypasses AC, EV and any resistances. If you are undead, keep them at the edge of LOS or behind other monsters and pelt them from afar with ranged attacks. Fortunately, their multiplicity of spells makes them torment slightly less often than other fiends, and having rN+++ greatly reduces the threat they pose. Use a holy wrath weapon or high-powered non-elemental conjurations to dispatch them, for they have no specific vulnerabilities.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, Tzitzimimeh had Bolt of Cold in their spell lists.
  • Prior to its removal in 0.26, Tzitzimimeh had rotting melee attacks.
  • Prior to 0.25, Tzitzimimeh casted Dispel Undead instead of Dispel Undead Range, which was functionally equivalent.
  • Prior to 0.19, Tzitzimitl melee created miasma, instead of slowing and rotting victims.
  • Prior to 0.18, they were called Shadow Fiends, who lacked miasma attacks and had less HD.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Tzitzimitl&oldid=79735"

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Tzitzimimeh''' are one of the most versatile among fiends, posing a threat to characters whether they're living or [[undead]]. While [[negative energy resistance]] helps reduce the effects of most of their attacks, [[torment]] and [[Dispel Undead]] always sting. They can be found in [[Pandemonium]] and the [[Hell]]s (primarily [[Tartarus]] and summoned by [[Ereshkigal]]), and some monsters may summon them with the [[Summon Greater Demon]] spell.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
This is the only fiend against which being undead does is not a guaranteed upside - in fact, it is possibly more dangerous to be so, given that Dispel Undead deals as much damage as [[Iron Shot]] but bypasses AC, EV and any resistances. If you are undead, keep them at the edge of LOS or behind other monsters and pelt them from afar with ranged attacks. Fortunately, their multiplicity of spells makes them torment slightly less often than other fiends, and having rN+++ greatly reduces the threat they pose. Use a [[holy wrath]] weapon or high-powered non-elemental conjurations to dispatch them, for they have no specific vulnerabilities.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], Tzitzimimeh had [[Bolt of Cold]] in their spell lists.
*Prior to its removal in [[0.26]], Tzitzimimeh had [[rot]]ting melee attacks.
*Prior to [[0.25]], Tzitzimimeh casted [[Dispel Undead]] instead of [[Dispel Undead Range]], which was functionally equivalent.
*Prior to [[0.19]], Tzitzimitl melee created [[miasma]], instead of slowing and rotting victims. 
*Prior to [[0.18]], they were called Shadow Fiends, who lacked miasma attacks and had less HD.

[[Category:Demon]]
